phrases: Right, that is all for today's class.
Remember, you will be studying for college exams next year,
Remember, you will be studying for college exams next year,
so you will not get to enjoy your next summer vacation.
Go out and enjoy the pool or the beach while you still can.
I would be happy to go with you.
Why the hell would we invite a teacher to come with us?
There is no point in going to the pool or beach with a bunch of guys.
Yasuda's pretty hot, but he keeps opening his dumb mouth.
He is a good teacher, too.
Did something happen between you and Yasuda-sensei, Hori?
Here is a little-known fact about me: I love flat-chested girls!
That is how he tried to cheer me up.
I have no idea what he was trying to do there.
A guy from another school asked me for your number.
Can I give it to him?
He did not have the guts to ask me himself, so no.
Yo, want to hit up karaoke on our way home?
I got these coupons that expire today.
I bet he is a total otaku.
What is he really like, Toru?
Does not seem like he has any friends we could ask, either.
Hori's always in a hurry to get home.
It is probably because she is got a boyfriend or something.
I mean, she is pretty and popular.
Got it, I will handle dinner.
I know, no getting out of overtime.
To hit up that store we saw in that fashion mag?
Let us have hamburg steak for dinner tonight.
Overtime and working on her day off...
Overtime and working on her day off...
I really wish she would learn to say no to people...
I think he is okay now, so I am going to go.
YOU-Uhh, I am so sorry you had to take care of him...
I am going to go, then.
Umm, if you are not in a hurry, why do not you come in for a few?
I have to thank you for taking care of him.
He got scared by a dog and fell down.
Thank you for going so far out of your way.
Oh, no, thank you for treating me.
Hey, is your coffee really bitter?
He is a real handful most of the time, I swear.
Still, I am really impressed that you take care of all the housework.
I never expected that from you, Hori-san.
but wait, you go to my school?!
That cannot be the same person!
I still do not believe it.
Hori, you are making the weirdest face right now.
Miyamura, can I have a sec?
You want me to come over again?
Sota wants'that cool dude' to come play with him.
Then I will pick up a picture book for him or something.
You do not have to go out of your way or anything.
I thought for sure after yesterday,
you would just avoid being around me.
I mean, yeah, it was a little awkward and freaked me out a bit.
You are so not like that here at school.
But I am kind of in the same boat,
so I do not really have a reason to avoid you or any...
Uh, I guess I am just not used to hearing this stuff...
You have got a nice smile.
You should wear your hair up more often.
I could, but then they would see I have piercings.
You have got a lot, too.
Four on each ear and one on my lip.
That is way too many piercings.
My mom said the same thing.
I like manga, but I am not into all that moe stuff.
His family runs a cake shop.
Yeah, it hurt a lot when I did it.
He pierced himself with a safety pin back in middle school.
He is not a very good student.
You have got almost straight A's!
Are not quiet guys with glasses supposed to be smart?
It is times like these when I realize
that my initial impression of him was totally off the mark.
that my initial impression of him was totally off the mark.
His lower eyelashes are really long.
There is a limited-time sale on eggs tomorrow with no purchase limit.
But it says only until 4 PM.
Yeah, but it will be fine.
As long as there is no emergency committee meeting or anything,
I will be able to buy a whole truckload of eggs on my way home!
please report to the AV room after homeroom.
But I am not giving up...
Get me those eggs as soon as possible
I am supposed to buy them now?!
And I have to run in this heat?!
Oh, yeah, uh, I ran into someone on my way there.
That Yuki girl you hang out with.
You ran into her dressed like this?
Yeah, but I do not think she knew it was me.
I kind of do not want anyone else to see you like this, Miyamura.
I forgot to get out drinks.
When I get to see you like this,
cooking dinner, or getting mad and yelling really loud...
Like, the fact that you do not care what your hair looks like at home,
or the way you are kind of brawny, in a good way-
I do not want anyone else to see this side of you, either.
It kind of feels like this moment belongs to me and only me.
Do not say stuff like that, you dummy!
Can I have some, too, please?
Ugh, how can he say something that cringey with a straight face?!
-My sister cannot stop saying dummy after she says it once.
Everyone has a side of them they do not want anyone to know about.
It is not that I do not like the way you are at school,
I like this side of you that gets mad and dresses plain at home.
I think you are way cuter like this.
The two of us ended up sharing this secret self time with each other.
It is only going to get hotter from here on out.
Wearing this jacket all the time's going to be torture.
We are going to be swimming in P.E.!
Better than making us run a marathon.
They are going to see everything!
What do I do about these?!
Sometimes I am not sure if you are incredibly bold
But what if we do have to run a marathon?
I have to wear my jacket!
I do not think they are going to make us run a marathon.
You see the two of them together a lot lately.
I never expected him to be in the picture.
Hori, let me see your notes!
Oh, I want to see, too!
Ugh, fine, but you really need to take your own.
I wish I could get good grades like her.
You and Hori sure have been getting along lately.
Of course not, that is ridiculous!
The two of you are not anything alike.
We would not make a good couple.
We just do not match up, uh...
Do not see those two together often.
Ishikawa-kun, do you have a crush on Hori-san?
So that is why you always glare at me when I am talking to Hori-san!
Sorry, Ishikawa-kun, I did not know you had a crush on Hori-san!
Do not announce it to the whole school!
We got to go to P.E.!
We are already going to be late, so let us take our time heading over.
Actually, here is something I have been wondering about for a while.
Why are you wearing your winter uniform in the middle of summer?
I know what it is going to sound like, Ishikawa-kun,
but the only person who is seen me without a shirt on is Hori-san.
Ishikawa-kun, you will not snitch on me to a teacher, right?
It would be a real pain if they found out...
So please do not tell anyone.
Yeah, I can see why you cannot wear our short-sleeved uniform now.
I totally had you pinned for the weird, gloomy, otaku type,
You are wrong about otaku, but everything else is spot on.
Now that I am getting a good look at him, he does have a nice face.
Was P.E. in the gym today?
Is this the kind of face Hori's into?
Why get inked or pierced if you are just going to end up hiding it?
You know how you do things in the spur of the moment?
If you are going to keep hiding them, then I will not tell anyone.
Though I want to know why you and Hori-san suddenly got all buddy-buddy.
It happened a little while back, actually.
But I get the feeling she is just being nice to me.
We are not anything more than friends, do not worry.
So you do not mind if I ask her out?
Wh-Why are you asking for my permission?
I do not know, just felt like it.
That is up to Hori-san, not me.
I cannot believe you skipped P.E., Toru...
Instead, I had to be the one to clean up!
Think about what you have done!
You were hanging out with Toru?
Hey, why are you avoiding me?
Look me in the eye when you are talking to me!
I-I am not, it is just...
I want to talk to you later.
Hori-san, I will go pick up Sota for you.
I would be a huge third wheel.
I will start dinner in a little bit.
If she says, you need to stop coming over, then that is that.
Did you seriously tell him you do not think we are a good match?
Did you really say that you think I am, I am just being nice to you?!
Did you tell him all that, Miyamura?!
That is really what you think this is?
You have been thinking that the whole time you have been coming over?
Ishikawa-kun's right, I am so gloomy and boring,
I figured I was dragging down your reputation, or bothering you.
So it is not like I think it is true or anything!
Why would you give a crap about my reputation?!
Do not just assume stuff without even asking!
Do not you ever say something like that again, dummy!
If you stopped coming over, Miyamura,
-who would wake me up when I fell asleep watching a movie?
-H-Hey- -who would wake me up when I fell asleep watching a movie?
-who would wake me up when I fell asleep watching a movie?
Do you have a crush on him or something?
Why do not you guys date?
Oh, I do not think we would make a good couple.
You Wear More Than One Face
You do not have to say it out loud, Ishikawa-kun!
You are such a sweet guy!
Maybe he is getting asked out?
